actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to direct the U.S. Postal Service to issue regulations prohibiting the use of collect-on-delivery mail service for the mailing of certain animals.

summary.text: Directs the United States Postal Service to issue regulations prohibiting the use of collect-on-delivery mail service for the mailing of any dog, cat, monkey, rabbit, or bird.

titles.title: A bill to direct the U.S. Postal Service to issue regulations prohibiting the use of collect-on-delivery mail service for the mailing of certain animals.
